Content: MP S.B Dissanayake who obtained the membership of SLPP says that MP Duminda Dissanayake who is the national organizer of the SLFP has a necessity for aligning with the UNP. He stated this based on a statement made by MP Duminda Dissanayake yesterday. MP S.B Dissanayake and Dilan Perera who obtained the membership of SLPP requested from the SLFP national organizer MP Duminda Dissanayake yesterday to provide them with the national list MP portfolios they had secured previously.
